stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Hawkeye Keylogger Observed in Transferred Copy Themed Emails
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 27 January 2015, a financial sector company observed a phishing campaign using Transferred Copy themed emails. The observed email contained a .rar attachment that claims to confirm a payment. When opened, it executes a Hawkeye Keylogger executable. It was reported that the keylogger in this specific email campaign attempts to communicate with IP address 192.99.212.64.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The attached malicious file, the Hawkeye Keylogger, has been widely reported. The files will vary widely as they are likely to be adapted to avoid detection.
----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----- Dear,
Please find attached TT copy of payment made to your account today,
Thank you ----- END EMAIL BODY -----

Once the Hawkeye Keylogger is executed it calls back to IP address: 192.99.212.64. This IP address was reported as the command and control (C2) for the observed instance of the Hawkeye Keylogger.
----- BEGIN DOMAIN WHOIS ----- Domain Whois record for: 192.99.212.64
Queried whois.internic.net with "dom ip-192-99-212.net"...
Domain Name: IP-192-99-212.NET Registrar: OVH Sponsoring Registrar IANA ID: 433 Whois Server: whois.ovh.com Referral URL: http://www.ovh.com Name Server: DNS10.OVH.CA Name Server: NS10.OVH.CA Status: clientDeleteProhibited http://www.icann.org/epp#clientDeleteProhibited Status: clientTransferProhibited http://www.icann.org/epp#clientTransferProhibited Updated Date: 14-may-2014 Creation Date: 14-may-2014 Expiration Date: 14-may-2015 ----- END DOMAIN WHOIS -----
